notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the xorg-x11-server SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2. It addresses 15 CVEs: CVE-2023-1393, CVE-2023-5367, CVE-2023-5380, CVE-2023-6377, CVE-2023-6478, and 10 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: xorg-x11-server security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2
